title: thayE idu taruNam
sahitya:
taayE idu | daruNam en edir varu- ||



vaay deri- | shanam tandaruL purivaay ||



(taayE)







anupallavi







,,vEyoodiya kani- | vaayan sOdari suba ||



,,veekshaNam migundd ka- | 



Taakshi vishaalaakshi ||



(taayE)







caraNam







gangai aNi vishva- | 



lingar magizhvE sin- ||



gaara vElanai pettru |



sirugandu miga ||



,,tungan kavikunjaran



pongu tamizhkkirangu soozhcci paripooraNa



kataakshi vishaalaakshi ||



(taayE)
